## MasonrySizing type

Allows the masonry layout to be addjusted at certain container sizes.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MasonrySizing = {
    columns: number;
    gutter: number;
    columnWidth?: NonNullable<React.CSSProperties["width"]>;
    cq?: number;
};
```
